programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Hoss befriends a former Army scout (Henry Hull) who drinks to forget the massacre of his troop.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A Deputy U.S. Marshal arrives to escort a man to California to testify against a gang; guest Dan Duryea.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A hired hand (Claude Akins) victimizes the Cartwrights' disabled neighbor (Harry Townes).

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Outlaws plot to steal a trunk containing the savings of a religious group heading for a new life in the West.

programme.title: The Spoilers
programme.desc: A cheated prospector (John Wayne) and a crooked gold official (Randolph Scott) have an epic brawl over a Yukon saloon queen (Marlene Dietrich).

programme.title: West Of Wyoming
programme.desc: With a crew of killers masquerading as ranch hands, Simon Miller runs a large ranch near Mesatown, while his henchmen carry out his plan to steal all of gold-bearing property of his neighboring ranchers.

programme.title: Blazing Bullets
programme.desc: A frontier lawman's search for a missing gold miner leads him to the grieving daughter's suspicious fiance.

programme.title: Colorado Ambush
programme.desc: A ranger uncovers a connection between a liveryman and a hotel hostess while investigating three deaths.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tells betrothed Hoss his intended is a compulsive gambler who caused her husband's death.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A Kentucky mountain clan swears revenge on Little Joe after he shoots a family member for arson.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: The wife of a preacher who recently established a mission for Apaches living near Gaheyville receives a suspicious telegram and fears her husband has been murdered; Travis learns the truth.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When a number of women are murdered under the same circumstances in a small Arizona town, Travis and Rynning are sent to investigate.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A railroad detective pursues famous criminals.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Margaret try to find a youth who disappeared while traveling in Kansas, but uncover more missing people with one thing in common -- they all stayed with Kate Bender.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Outlaws target the home of Don Jose while he is leading the annual Ride of the Ranchers.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: The leader of a cattle rustling gang declares his innocence in the robbery of school funds.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Pat Brady buys an old ghost town inhabited by a strange old man (Tom London).

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Dale helps investigate the mayor (Harry Lauter) of a small town who is suspected of being corrupt.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A young carnival worker is framed for the murder of his boss.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Pat Brady is elected sheriff just in time to catch a notorious killer.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy hires an ex-con who is quickly suspected of committing several recent robberies.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A woman from Connecticut arrives at Dale's cafe seeking her father.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A greedy veterinarian plans to murder a blind prospector who is using Roy's dog.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy and Pat aid a boxer (Charles Bronson) who has criminal connections.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Con men trick an unsuspecting Dale into selling the ranch.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A group of cattle rustlers tries to sell stolen beef to Dale's cafe.

programme.title: Partners of the Trail
programme.desc: Two lawmen uncover a plot to steal a gold claim when they ride into town to investigate several killings.

programme.title: Land of the Outlaws
programme.desc: A cowboy (Johnny Mack Brown) and his partner (Raymond Hatton) ride where the lawless try to hide.

programme.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a young half-Native American girl, whose mother has recently died. He must find her white father in order to claim her hefty inheritance.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Marshal John Carruthers helps a sheriff find out who stole the town's payroll, and together they discover the town's leader stole the money to buy up all the land.

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: Cory Lambert is a wildlife officer who finds the body of a teenager on an American Indian reservation in snowy Wyoming. Teaming up with an FBI agent, the duo soon find that their lives are in danger while trying to solve the mystery of her death.
